title: QuantifierEnum
description: Represents the enumerated values to specify a logical quantification, i.e. either All or Any.

oneOf.title: All
oneOf.description: Specifies that the condition in the scope of the quantifier is true of every member of the domain i.e. every one of the elements in scope.

oneOf.title: Any
oneOf.description: Specifies that the condition in the scope of the quantifier is true of at least one member of the domain i.e. one or more of the elements in scope.
